column4: In accordance with M.G.L. Ch. 40 S. 5B, the Town may appropriate in any year an amount not exceeding, in the aggregate, 10% of the amount raised in the preceding fiscal year's tax levy.

This Fund was created as a result of the 2005 Proposition 2 1/2 override. The Town makes annual appropriations to the fund until the time in which it is necessary to make withdrawals for the purposes of balancing the general fund budget.
A revenue source that results from the calculation, as of July 1, of a community's remaining, unrestricted funds from operations of the previous fiscal year, based on the balance sheet as of June 30.

column2: Avalon Bay School Enrollment Mitigation Fund
column4: In accordance with M.G.L. Ch. 40 S. 13, the Town established this fund for the purposes of offsetting the costs associated with significant property loss.

column2: Balances from Prior Yr. Capital Articles
